title: Griffin's Daughter
description: Born between two cultures, a young woman searches for acceptance. An ancient evil searches for her.A young girl lives as a social outcast due to her mixed human and elven blood. To escape an arranged marriage, Jelena flees into the unknown on a quest to find her elven father. Her journey takes her on an unexpected adventure of magic, danger, and most startling of all - true love.
author: Leslie Ann Moore
